description: Introducing the new Core 200 Crew, their lightest base layer is crafted from of their iconic lightweight 200gm Signature Blend of Merino Wool and Rayon from Bamboo to ensure maximum breathability and temperature regulation. Beloved by those with merino irritations, it’s an unrivalled on-skin layer that keeps you stink free for days on end. Couple these benefits with it’s the durable construction; this layer will level-up outdoor endeavours for years to come.
name: Lebent Core 200 Crew - Mens
